message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be a valuable asset to you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my investment within $10,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me.  This product offers a lot of value that you'll see returned quickly.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your position on the value of the product. I am still looking to stay within my budget. Could we possibly agree on $15,000?
